bamboracheckout.label: Bambora Checkout 1.1.1
bamboracheckout.comment: Detailed description of these settings are to be found here.

active.label: Enabled:
active.comment: To enable and disable this payment method.

title.label: Title:
title.comment: The title of the payment method displayed to the customers.

merchantnumber.label: Merchant number:
merchantnumber.comment: The number identifying your Bambora merchant account. If you don't know your merchant number, please log into your Bambora account. Go to Settings -> Merchant numbers to view your merchant number.

accesstoken.label: Access token:
accesstoken.comment: The Access token for the API user received from the Bambora administration. If you don't know your Access token please log into your Bambora account. Go to Settings -> API users to view or create a new API user.

secrettoken.label: Secret token:
secrettoken.comment: The Secret token for the API user received from the Bambora administration. The Secret token is only displayed to you when you create a new API user and as such you should take note of it. If you have lost your Secret token, log into your Bambora account and create a new API user. Go to Settings -> API users -> Create API users

md5key.label: MD5 Key:
md5key.comment: The MD5 key is used to stamp data sent between Magento and Bambora to prevent it from being tampered with. The MD5 key is optional but if used here, must be the same as in the Bambora administration. To view your MD5 key please log into your Bambora account and go to Settings -> Merchant numbers -> Edit

paymentwindowid.label: Payment Window ID:
paymentwindowid.comment: The ID of the payment window to use. You can find the available payment windows in the Bambora administration. Please log into your Bambora account and go to Settings -> Payment windows.

instantcapture.label: Instant capture:
instantcapture.comment: Set to Yes if you wish to capture payments at the same time they are authorized. In some countries, this is only permitted if the consumer receives the products right away Ex. digital products.

windowstate.label: Windows state:
windowstate.comment: Set to Overlay for the Payment Window to open as a overlayed window on top of the store. The store will be visible behind the payment window. Set to Full Screen to open the payment window in the same window but in full-screen. The store will not be visible in this setting.

immediateredirecttoaccept.label: Immediate Redirect
immediateredirecttoaccept.comment: Set to Yes to immediately redirect your customer back to you shop after the payment completed.

addsurchargetopayment.label: Add payment fee to order
addsurchargetopayment.comment: If the customer pays for the payment surcharge the amount will not be displayed on the order confirmation. The surcharge is displayed on the order, invoice and creditmemo totals

sendmailorderconfirmation.label: Send Email Order Confirmation:
sendmailorderconfirmation.comment: Enabling this setting will result in an order confirmation is e-mailed to the customer as the payment is made.

remoteinterface.label: Process payments from within the order administration of Magento:
remoteinterface.comment:
Enable this option in order to capture, credit and delete payments directly from the Magento administration on the order page. You then don't need to enter the administration area of the payment system in order to process payments.

Important information when processing the payments from Magento:
- When an order is canceled or voided the payment is deleted within the payment system.
- When an invoice is created the payment can be captured from the bottom of the invoice.
- When a credit memo is created the payment can be credited back to the customer from the bottom of the credit memo.

instantinvoice.label: Instant invoice:
instantinvoice.comment: This is used if you wish to create an invoice once the payment has been authorized. Notice that this will also try to capture the payment

instantinvoicemail.label: Instant invoice mail:
instantinvoicemail.comment: If instant invoice then send invoice to customer.

masscaptureinvoicemail.label: Mass Invoice and Capture mail:
masscaptureinvoicemail.comment: When bulk invoice and capture then send invoice mail to customer.

order_status.label: Order status (Before the payment is made):
order_status.comment: Set the status of the order before the payment is made. This is used to distinguish between paid and not paid orders!

order_status_after_payment.label: New order status (When the payment is made):
order_status_after_payment.comment: Set the status of the order after the payment is made. This is used to distinguish between paid and not paid orders!

useautocancel.label: Use Auto-Cancel:
useautocancel.comment: If enabled this will auto-cancel orders where no payment has been made in the time interval: from 1 day ago until 1 hour ago. Notice! For this to work you must setup cronjobs for your Magento installation. Contact your hosting provider for assistance on how to do so.

sort_order.label: Sort order:
sort_order.comment: The order of which this payment method is displayed to the customer.
